summary: This bill, H.R. 5574, seeks to extend the National Flood Insurance Program (NFIP). The bill amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968, specifically sections 1309(a) and 1319, to replace the existing expiration date of September 30, 2023, with November 21, 2025. This extension ensures the continuation of the NFIP, providing coverage for flood-related damages to property owners.
